snippet: This type of threat is common – leaders in both chambers often say they will keep members in town longer during the holidays – but rarely materializes.
abstract: This type of threat is common – leaders in both chambers often say they will keep members in town longer during the holidays – but rarely materializes.
lead_paragraph: The House is done with its business for the week, but apparently members should not get used to Wednesday slides.

headline.main: Cantor Says House Will Not Adjourn Until Deal Reached
